definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The seamstress bound the hem of the dress with a ruffle.
sentences.chinese: 女裁缝用褶裥饰边给女上衣镶边。

sentences.english: He hit his forehead against the kerb when he fell.
sentences.chinese: 他摔倒时额头碰在了路边镶边石上。

sentences.english: Her sleeves are bordered with narrow blue bands.
sentences.chinese: 她的袖子用蓝色窄条镶边。

sentences.english: The French-held island of Corsica appears as a dark mass rimmed with light near the top of the frame.
sentences.chinese: 照片上方被灯火镶边的黑暗区域是法属科西嘉岛。

sentences.english: In the fog he felt for the kerb with his walking stick.
sentences.chinese: 在雾中他用手杖摸索街道的镶边石。

sentences.english: Slouchy denim bucket shape with suede trim.
sentences.chinese: 懒散麂皮镶边的牛仔桶形状。

sentences.english: Wisdom is a gemstone. If set with modesty, it will be more beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 智慧是宝石，如果用谦虚镶边，就会更加灿烂夺目。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the mountains just stopped, dropping into a void fringed with black sand and surf.
sentences.chinese: 有时，山脉中断了，跌落进黑沙和海浪镶边的空地。

sentences.english: The intelligence is a precious stone, if trim border with the condescension, would be more brilliant to dazzle the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 智慧是宝石，如果用谦虚镶边，就会更加灿烂夺目。

sentences.english: Muhammad's seal was an engraved Cornelian set in a silver ring.
sentences.chinese: 穆罕默德的玉玺就是一枚银环镶边的阴雕红玉髓。
“我要送些镶边小手帕，”贝思说。

sentences.english: Into a well-chilled cocktail glass rimmed with salt.
sentences.chinese: 成为一个良好的冰鲜鸡尾酒玻璃镶边与盐。

sentences.english: For unmounted units, the WWII German Panzer two piece uniform.
sentences.chinese: 二战德军装甲部队的军装，没有镶边。

sentences.english: She braided the neckline and cuffs of the dress.
sentences.chinese: 她给连衣裙的领口和袖口镶边。

sentences.english: Repeat prints and motifs such as a contemporary border or metallic wallpaper in the kitchen and again in the hallway.
sentences.chinese: 再在厨房和门厅用现代镶边或金属墙纸等图案装饰。

sentences.english: Wisdom is a gemstone. If set with modesty it will be more brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 智慧是宝石，如果用谦逊镶边，就会更加灿烂夺目。

definition: Jacquard weave (machine weaving leaving protruding pattern)
